headlinesItem.headline: Diamondbacks-Rockies Preview
headlinesItem.description: While one of their top young sluggers recovers from strep throat, more than a few Colorado Rockies fans may have hoarse throats after the first two games of their series against the Arizona Diamondbacks.

headlinesItem.headline: Athletics-Mariners Preview
headlinesItem.description: Jesus Montero just wants to help the Seattle Mariners.

headlinesItem.headline: Rockies 8, Diamondbacks 7
headlinesItem.description: J.J. Putz tried to sneak a fastball up and in on a cagey hitter.

headlinesItem.headline: Pirates-Giants Preview
headlinesItem.description: As starter Ryan Vogelsong comes off the disabled list to make his season debut for the San Francisco Giants, closer Brian Wilson prepares to go on the DL with the possibility of missing the rest of the season.

headlinesItem.headline: Padres-Dodgers Preview
headlinesItem.description: The only thing that may be able to help the San Diego Padres against Clayton Kershaw is another case of the stomach flu for the reigning NL Cy Young Award winner.

headlinesItem.headline: Giants 4, Pirates 3
headlinesItem.description: Clint Barmes has long been a reliable shortstop for manager Clint Hurdle. From Colorado to Pittsburgh.
